title.en: A Prayer to Tārā for Averting Obstructive Circumstances

text.en: Oṃ. Glorious one, as I recall your name,
text.en-trans: om, palmo khyö tsen yi la drenpa yi

text.en: Act swiftly to pacify all fears and dangers.
text.en-trans: jikpa tadak nyurdu zhidzé ching

text.en: Supreme giver, effortlessly bestowing twofold benefit,
text.en-trans: dön nyi bemé drub ter chok jin ma

text.en: Exalted and reverend Tārā, to you I pray.
text.en-trans: lama jetsün drolmar solwa deb

text.en: Tyrants, fires, drowning, captivity, poison and weaponry,
text.en-trans: gyalpo mé chu chak drok duk tsön dang

text.en: Snakes, lions, elephants and flesh-eating spirits,
text.en-trans: drul dang sengé langchen shaza dang

text.en: Thieves, robbers, demons, elemental forces, zombies and the rest—
text.en-trans: chomkün sinpo jungpo ro long sok

text.en: To Tārā, who guards against all such dangers, I pray.
text.en-trans: jikpa kyab dzé drolmar solwa deb

text.en: For those whose power of life is depleted,
text.en-trans: drowa gangzhik tsé yi ulwa dang

text.en: Or who are shrouded in delusion’s darkness,
text.en-trans: timuk münpé tibpé dro nam la

text.en: You display your radiant moon-like face and immediately
text.en-trans: da zhal dütsi nangwa kyewé mö

text.en: Bestow longevity and wisdom—to you, I pray.
text.en-trans: tsé dang yeshe jin la solwa deb

text.en: Brilliant red, with a hook of ruby-coloured light rays,
text.en-trans: mar sal pema ragé özer gyi

text.en: You capture all that is excellent in existence and peace.
text.en-trans: chakkyü sizhi püntsok guk dzé ching

text.en: Great sovereign, enduring and universally powerful—
text.en-trans: kün la wanggyur takpé gyalmo cher

text.en: To Tārā, who is swift and courageous, I pray.
text.en-trans: drolma nyurma pamor solwa deb

text.en: Never wavering from peace, you wear a frown
text.en-trans: zhi lé ma yö nyingjé tröpa yi

text.en: Of compassionate wrath and proclaim the sound of Hūṃ.
text.en-trans: tronyer yo dang hung gi dra drakpé

text.en: Vanquisher of all māras and obstructing forces—
text.en-trans: dü dang gek nam malü jom dzé ma

text.en: To Tārā, who is magnificent and ferocious, I pray.
text.en-trans: drolma drak jé chenmor solwa deb

text.en: Intoxicated with bliss, you roar with laughter,
text.en-trans: dewé rö nyö zhepé ngaro dang

text.en: And stamping both feet, thoroughly suppress
text.en-trans: zhab nyi dabpé jikten dünpö tsok

text.en: The seven worlds and overpower the three realms.
text.en-trans: rabtu nön ching kham sum zil gyi nön

text.en: To you whose victory is unbounded, I pray.
text.en-trans: tayé namgyalma la solwa deb

text.en: For those who are lacking in wealth
text.en-trans: gangzhik nor gyi ulwar gyurpa la

text.en: You bring vast showers of varied riches
text.en-trans: nam mang norbü char chen bebpa yi

text.en: And eliminate all the suffering of poverty.
text.en-trans: pongpé dukngal tadak sel dzepé

text.en: To you, who are noble and perfectly generous, I pray.
text.en-trans: jinpa tarchin pakmar solwa deb

text.en: Utterly freed from saṃsāra’s major flaws,
text.en-trans: khorwé nyepa ché lerab drol zhing

text.en: You’ve reached the highest level of untainted joy
text.en-trans: zakdral gawa chok gi tser sön ching

text.en: And revel in enduring, untransferable great bliss.
text.en-trans: pomé dewa ché la tak rolpa

text.en: To you, the powerful and perfectly ethical, I pray.
text.en-trans: tsultrim parchin wangmor solwa deb

text.en: Embracing the welfare of beings as limitless as space,
text.en-trans: khanyam drowé dön la rab zö ching

text.en: You endure harm and injury with earth-like equanimity,
text.en-trans: kün gyi nyertsé sa zhi tabu yi

text.en: Never angry but always full of compassion,
text.en-trans: taktu tromé nyingjé yong gangwa

text.en: To you, the peaceful and tolerant of hardship, I pray.
text.en-trans: zöpa katub zhi mar solwa deb

text.en: Never faltering even for a moment,
text.en-trans: kechik tsam yang dalwa mepa yi

text.en: Your enthusiasm for freeing beings is intense
text.en-trans: drowa drol la rabtu tsönpa gang

text.en: And continues until saṃsāra is emptied.
text.en-trans: khorwa tongpar magyur desi du

text.en: To you, the diligent liberator of beings, I pray.
text.en-trans: tsöndrü dro drolma la solwa deb

text.en: Taking delight in an ocean of unmoving absorption,
text.en-trans: miyo tingdzin gyatso rab nyé shing

text.en: You’ve pacified all forms of conceptual thought,
text.en-trans: nampar chepé toktsok tamché zhi

text.en: And savour the taste of unmediated great bliss.
text.en-trans: nammé dewa chenpö rö nyö ma

text.en: To you, the great adept of concentration, I pray.
text.en-trans: samten drubpa chenmor solwa deb

text.en: Directly seeing all dharmas, profound and vast,
text.en-trans: zab dang gyaché chö kün ngönsum zik

text.en: You possess inexhaustible, ocean-like wisdom,
text.en-trans: yeshe gyatso zepa mepé tuk

text.en: And vast qualities equal to those of the buddhas.
text.en-trans: yönten gyatso sangye kün dang nyam

text.en: To you, Tārā of perfect wisdom, I pray.
text.en-trans: sherab parchin drolma solwa deb

text.en: Through the power of this, my constant and devoted prayer to you,
text.en-trans: khyé la taktu depé soldeb tü

text.en: May you afford me and other beings protection from every obstacle.
text.en-trans: dak sok dro nam barché kün lé kyob

text.en: And may all be auspicious, so that we are ever in Tārā’s care
text.en-trans: drolmé tukjé taktu jezung né

text.en: And the twofold aims of self and other are spontaneously accomplished.
text.en-trans: dön nyi lhün gyi drubpé tashi shok
